anime.description: http://anidb.net/ch91416 [Jinguuji Kouma] is the smart and handsome student council president. His elegant smile captures the hearts of women. http://anidb.net/ch91417 [Hayakawa Tsubasa] is a multi-talented and gentle shop assistant at a café. His cafe latte with owl latte art is very popular with female customers. The two men travel through time to fight their archenemy. The charming "Butlers," as they are called, fight supernatural battles and also experience a slapstick comedic life at their academy. Source: ANN

tag.name: original work
tag.description: What the anime is based on! This is given as the original work credit in the OP. Mostly of academic interest, but a useful bit of info, hinting at the possible depth of story.

tag.name: new
tag.description: Not based on anything, the story is a new work, usually made up by the people involved in creating the anime. Generally if an original work (原作) credit is given, it will be to the studio, or director, or other members of the production team.

episode.title: 華麗なる対決
The Elegant Battle
Kareinaru Taiketsu
episode.summary: The day of the event to promote the city has arrived. The whole city was holding a festival and Café de Wayne was also helping out with a pop-up shop. Akira asks J and the others to help out with the event and asks them to dress up as butlers, but they decline. Hotaru then suggests that they do a competition in customer service to help bring in more people. J is reluctant, but he finds out he’ll be facing off with Hayakawa and accepts. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: すれ違う思い
Misunderstandings
Surechigau Omoi
episode.summary: The time for Koyomi Academy’s event to promote the city has arrived. It’s a time that the student council needs to come together, but Ren notices that Hotaru keeps disappearing. He finds Hotaru secretly meeting with their music teacher, Mikami Satsuki. Ren is surprised at the way Hotaru is acting towards their teacher, and to make things worse, Holmes and Watson also spot them. Meanwhile, Haruto worries about J, thinking he might also feel lonely as he does at times. Not knowing how Haruto feels, J was trying to figure out if Hayakawa had Tenna’s pendant or not, and was planning to run into him again. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 表と裏
Outside and Inside
Omote to Ura
episode.summary: J asks the one person who understands his situation, Headmaster Mikuni, to let him use his old mansion as the student council room. J was able to reunite with his old friend Hayakawa, who may know what happened to Tenna, but he doesn’t seem to remember anything. Jay frantically continues to look for clues and tries to hunt Hayakawa down again. Meanwhile, weird rumors were spreading about Hayakawa, which was affecting the business at the café that he worked at. It was quite popular because Hayakawa was rather handsome, but somehow that took an ugly turn. Apparently, someone was spreading rumors that Hayakawa was making unwanted advances to the women who would visit the café... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 運命の時
The Destined Moment
Unmei no Toki
episode.summary: The prestigious Koyomi Academy... The newly elected members of the student council was all that was being talked about at school. All of the members are handsome, but the one who was getting the most attention was the president, J. He had only recently transferred to the school and was elected student council president, which was rather unprecedented. J was somewhat of an idol to all of the girls at the school. However, he had a secret that no one knew about. And for some reason, he was trying to find out more about a man named Hayakawa... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 白鳥蓮の憂鬱な一日
Shiratori Ren`s Day Filled with Melancholy
Shiratori Ren no Yuuutsu na Ichinichi
episode.summary: Hotaru, Ren, and Dracula all have birthmarks appear, revealing that they are also descendants of the bloodline. Hotaru’s powers had already come to light, so he didn’t have a hard time believing this fact, and Dracula seemed to also take the news okay. However, Ren insisted that this must’ve been some kind of coincidence, and refused to listen. Meanwhile, Haruto and Dracula awaken to their Butler powers, but Ren still refuses to believe it. Dracula sees a terrifying vision of his powers and he tells the others... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 目覚めの時
The Time of Awakening
Mezame no Toki
episode.summary: It’s revealed that Haruto is a descendant from the bloodline, and J asks him to help him solve the mystery behind the numbers that appeared from Tenna’s bracelet. Haruto was conflicted between the fact that J was relying on him and the fact that if they were able to solve this mystery, J would probably disappear. Meawhile, Hayakawa was explaining to Akira why he and J were sent here from a hundred years ago at Café de Wayne. Suddenly, the two hear an unfamiliar voice, and it seems to be coming from P-chan... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 過去の逆襲
Revenge from the Past
Kako no Gyakushuu
episode.summary: J is attacked by a mysterious man, and their battle ends up part of the mansion to collapse. The pillar that collapsed ends up falling on Haruto, and he is severely injured. J visits Haruto in his hospital room and tells him it’s all his fault, but he refuses to elaborate. Haruto becomes tired of all of J’s excuses and distances himself from J. J leaves the hospital and finds out there are strange things going on at the school. Someone was putting up scandalous posters about him all over the school, and he could tell that everyone at the school was instantly acting colder towards him. J remembers something that Hikari told him and he starts to feel emotionally cornered. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 名探偵ホームズの事件簿
The Case Files of the Great Detective Holmes
Meitantei Holmes no Jikenbo
episode.summary: The numbers 2220 suddenly appear from J’s bracelet. While J is trying to figure out what the numbers mean, he hears news that they’re trying to demolish the mansion. J doesn’t want to lose the one place he has left that holds memories of Tenna, so he goes to the headmaster to discuss the matter. The headmaster tells J that it’s the chairman’s decision and there’s very little he can do about it. The rest of the student council members see J look down, so they try to figure out a way to help him. They end up coming up with a plan to make the mansion look like it’s haunted. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 千年百年
A Thousand Years, a Hundred Years
Sennen Hyakunen
episode.summary: Haruto tries to stop J, but J continues to walk toward the pillar of light. The others could do nothing but stare in shock, as J walked over to Mikuni. J was supposed to be their friend, but he was seemingly going to join Mikuni and head back into time, and this world would disappear. The final showdown was about to begin... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 岐路
Crossroads
Kiro
episode.summary: Holmes and the others find out the truth and try to warn J, but Hikari manages to steal the pendant and broch. The distortion in the space-time continues to get worse, and a huge hole appears in the sky. J does everything he can to get the pendant back from Hikari. Once they finally stopped, they found Mikuni waiting for them. Mikuni then tells them that it’s about time to depart. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 愛執
Attachment
Aishuu
episode.summary: J is enraged when he finds out that Hayakawa knew everything and still didn’t save Tenna. Hayakawa tries to dodge J’s attacks and asks him if he truly understands what Tenna wanted. Meanwhile at the school, Haruto and the others look for J and end up at the greenhouse. They find Hikari and the injured Holmes and Watson on the ground. Akira was on a delivery, but tries to get more information about Mikuni for Hayakawa. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: メッセージ
Message
Message
episode.summary: While the rest of the student council members start to awaken to their powers, the distortion in the space-time starts to appear. Haruto solves the mystery behind the numbers that appeared from J’s bracelet and explains its meaning to everyone else. It’s then that Holmes and Watson figured out the connection between J and Hayakawa and they head over to Café de Wayne to ask Hayakawa about it in person. Hayakwa tries to dodge their question, but a particular phrase brings him sadness... Source: crunchyroll
